It doesn't even mean anything tbf. Everything still will depend on EA. As an example, let's take GK, because there is a clear winner among GK's. But, if we calculate the weight of votes of De Gea and Buffon, we have:

1) De Gea: (31/41)*0.6 = 0.45

2) Buffon: (7/41)*0.6 = 0.1

So, if EA vote for Buffon, he will have ( 0.1 + 0.4 = 0.5 ) votes and win, even though De Gea was a clear winner in community voting.
